segments.text: >> GOOD EVENING. THE TIME IS NOW 7:00 PM.
I'LL CALL THE ORDER OF THE TOWN COUNCIL MEETING OF TUESDAY, DECEMBER 16.
WE'LL BEGIN WITH AN INVOCATION FOLLOWED BY A MOMENT OF SILENCE,
A FEW MOMENTS,
AND THE PLEDGE OF ALLEGIANCE.
IF ALL OF THOSE THAT ARE ABLE, PLEASE JOIN ME IN STANDING.
>> LET US PRAY. ALMIGHTY GOD,
AS WE GATHER FOR OUR FINAL COUNCIL MEETING OF THE YEAR,
WE PAUSE IN GRATITUDE.
THANKFUL FOR THE GOOD FORTUNE WE HAVE SHARED,
THE PROGRESS WE HAVE MADE TOGETHER,
AND THE SPIRIT OF WARMTH AND GOODWILL THAT SURROUNDS THIS SEASON.
WE ASK FOR YOUR GUIDANCE AND WISDOM FOR
THE DECISIONS TO BE MADE THIS EVENING AND THROUGHOUT THE COMING YEAR.
MAY OUR HOMES, BUSINESSES,
AND STREETS BE KEPT SAFE AND MAY THE YEAR AHEAD BRING INCREASED PEACE,
SHARED PROSPERITY, AND ENDURING GOODWILL TO ALL, AMEN.
WE WILL NOW PAUSE FOR A MOMENT OF SILENCE.
>> PLEASE JOIN ME IN THE PLEDGE OF ALLEGIANCE?
>> MAY WE HAVE A ROLL CALL, PLEASE?
>> MAYOR KRITSKI.
>> HERE.
>> VICE MAYOR DELANEY?
>> HERE.
>> COUNSELOR TROY.
>> HERE.
>> COUNSELOR GEISINGER?
>> HERE.
>> COUNSELOR SUNSTROM?
>> HERE.
>> TOWN MANAGER KITTZIO?
>> HERE.
>> TOWN ATTORNEY BAIRD?
>> HERE.
>> WE BEGIN TONIGHT.
WE HAVE ONE PRESENTATION GETTING AN UPDATE FROM OUR JUPITER FIRE RESCUE DEPARTMENT.
I PRESUME THAT'S GIVEN BY OUR CHIEF.
>> GOOD EVENING, MAYOR. COUNSEL, AND ALL THOSE ATTENDING IN PERSON,
AS WELL AS THOSE VIRTUALLY WATCHING TONIGHT'S MEETING.
WE'RE HONORED TO SHARE AN UPDATE WITH JUPITER FIRE RESCUE.
WE'VE BEEN COUNTING DOWN THE MONTHS UNTIL JUPITER FIRE RESCUE
BEGINS PROVIDING FIRE AND EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY.
IN LESS THAN SIX MONTHS FROM TONIGHT,
WE HAVE HIRED ALL OF OUR OPERATIONAL PERSONNEL,
COMPLETED CONSTRUCTION OF OUR NEW FIRE STATIONS,
RECEIVED ALL OF OUR FIRE APPARATUS AND AMBULANCES AND
COMMENCED TRAINING FOR THE TRANSITION OF SERVICES TO OCCUR ON OCTOBER 1 OF 2026.
THE SLIDE BEFORE YOU IS OUR IMPLEMENTATION TIMELINE.
WE'RE IN THE PROCESS OF ORDERING
ALL THE NECESSARY SUPPLIES AND EQUIPMENT FOR AMBULANCES AND FIRE TRUCKS,
AND ALL OF THAT WILL BE ARRIVING IN THE NEXT FEW MONTHS.
TONIGHT, I'M GOING TO PROVIDE AN UPDATE ON THREE ITEMS.
THE PURCHASE OF OUR SELF-CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS,
RECRUITING AND HIRING FOR CAPTAINS, LIEUTENANTS,
AND DRIVER ENGINEERS, AS WELL AS
THE TEMPORARY FIRE STATION FOR ABACOA AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS.
ON YOUR AGENDA TONIGHT IS A REQUEST TO
APPROVE THE PURCHASE OF OUR SELF CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS,
ALONG WITH THE NECESSARY SUPPORTING EQUIPMENT.
OUR SELF CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS IS
A SINGLE MOST CRITICAL PIECE OF PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT A FIREFIGHTER WEARS.
IT IS THE LIFELINE THAT ALLOWS OUR PERSONNEL TO BREATHE SAFELY IN TOXIC,
SMOKE FILLED, AND OXYGEN DEFICIENT ENVIRONMENTS.
WITHOUT THESE, WE SIMPLY CANNOT ENTER A BURNING BUILDING,
A CONFINED SPACE ON AN AREA WITH TOXIC SUBSTANCES.
THIS IS OUR SELF CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS OR SCBA.
THIS IS THE AIR PACK, AND THE FACE MATH,
ALONG WITH A PASS DEVICE OR A WARNING DEVICE AND ENGAGE.
AS OUTLINED ON THE SLIDE,
WE'RE GOING TO BE PURCHASING A FULL ECOSYSTEM OF RESPIRATORY PROTECTION,
THAT'S REQUIRED TO LAUNCH OUR DEPARTMENT.
THAT INCLUDES 38 MSA G1 XR ADDITION AIR PACKS.
THESE ARE THE PRIMARY UNITS WORN ON THE FIREFIGHTERS PACKS,
38 SPARE AIR CYLINDERS.
THAT'S IN ADDITION TO THE CYLINDERS THAT COME WITH THE PACKS.
THIS ENSURES THAT WE CAN SWAP OUT BOTTLES AND KEEP WORKING DURING
PROLONGED EVENTS, 98 FACE PIECES.
THIS WILL PROVIDE EVERY FIREFIGHTER WITH
THEIR OWN PROPERLY FITTED MASS FOR HYGIENE AND SAFETY.
FOR RAPID INTERVENTION TEAM PACKS,
THESE ARE SPECIALIZED AIR SUPPLIES USED TO SOLELY RESCUE A DOWN FIREFIGHTER AND
A FIT TESTING SYSTEM TO LEGALLY AND
SAFELY CERTIFY THAT MASS SEAL CORRECTLY TO EACH FIREFIGHTERS FACE.
WE SELECTED THIS PARTICULAR MSA G1 XR EDITION FOR THREE SPECIFIC STRATEGIC REASONS.
FIRST, SAFETY AND COMPLIANCE.
I'M PROUD TO REPORT THAT JUPITER FIRE RESCUE WILL BE ONE OF THE FIRST AGENCIES TO FIELD
AIRPAC CERTIFIED TO THE 2025 EDITION OF THE NFPA 1970 STANDARD.
THIS IS ABSOLUTELY THE LATEST SAFETY BENCHMARK IN THE INDUSTRY,
ENSURING OUR DEPARTMENT STARTS OPERATIONS AT THE PINNACLE OF COMPLIANCE.
SECOND, IS OPERATIONAL CAPABILITY.
HISTORICALLY, COMMUNICATING WHILE WEARING A MASK INSIDE OF A FIRE HAS BEEN DIFFICULT.
THESE NEW UNITS SOLVE THAT WITH INTEGRATED NOISE CANCELING,
VOICE AMPLIFIERS, AND BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY DIRECTLY TO OUR RADIOS.
OUR FIREFIGHTERS WILL BE ABLE TO HEAR AND BE
HEARD CLEARLY EVEN IN HIGH NOISE ENVIRONMENTS.
THIRD, IS FISCAL EFFICIENCY AND LONGEVITY.
WE'RE PROPOSING TO PURCHASE THIS EQUIPMENT.
UNDER A COMPETITIVE PIGGYBACK CONTRACT WITH LAKE COUNTY,
FLORIDA THROUGH 108 FIRE AND SAFETY.
THIS ENSURES THAT WE RECEIVE THE BEST AVAILABLE GOVERNMENT PRICING.
FURTHERMORE, THESE UNITS WILL USE A CENTRAL RECHARGEABLE BATTERY SYSTEM ELIMINATING
THE RECURRING COST OF PURCHASING
THOUSANDS OF ALKALINE BATTERIES OVER THE LIFE OF THE UNITS.
UNITS ARE DESIGNED WITH A 10 YEAR SERVICE LIFE AND THEY CAN
BE UPDATED VIA SOFTWARE DURING THAT SERVICE LIFE,
PREVENTING THEM FROM BECOMING OBSOLETE AS TECHNOLOGY EVOLVES.
THIS ACQUISITION IS NOT JUST ABOUT BUYING GEAR.
IT'S ABOUT ENSURING THAT WHEN OUR FIREFIGHTERS ANSWER A CALL IN 2026,
THEY HAVE THE SAFEST,
MOST RELIABLE TECHNOLOGY PROTECTING THEM SO THEY CAN PROTECT OTHERS.
NEXT ON THE AGENDA FOR US IN THIS UPDATE IS OUR RECRUITING AND HIRING.
YESTERDAY, THE TOWN BEGAN RECRUITING AND HIRING FOR OUR OPERATIONAL PERSONNEL.
WE POSTED A JOB ANNOUNCEMENT FOR 12 FIRE RESCUE CAPTAINS AND 12 FIRE RESCUE LIEUTENANTS.
BOTH WITH AN ANTICIPATED START DATE OF MAY 11 OF 2026.
I'M HAPPY TO REPORT IN JUST THE FIRST 24 HOURS OF THAT POSTING.
WE HAVE 40 APPLICANTS FOR CAPTAIN AND 37 APPLICANTS FOR LIEUTENANT.
IN THE COMING WEEKS, WE'LL POST OUR JOB ANNOUNCEMENT FOR DRIVER ENGINEERS,
ALSO WITH A START DATE OF MAY 11.
IN THE BEGINNING OF JANUARY,
WE'LL BEGIN ADVERTISING FOR OUR 54 FIREFIGHTER EMT OR FIREFIGHTER PARAMEDIC POSITIONS,
ALL WITH AN ANTICIPATED START DATE OF JUNE 1ST, 2026.
WE'RE EXCITED AND ANXIOUS TO GET OUR ENTIRE TEAM ON BOARD AND TO
ESTABLISH THE BEACON OF EXCELLENCE FOR THE FIRE SERVICE RIGHT HERE IN JUPITER.
ON THIS AGENDA FOR LATER IN THE MEETING IS
A SPECIAL EXCEPTION AND SITE PLAN AMENDMENT APPLICATION FOR THE TEMPORARY FIRE STATION.
I'LL ADDRESS THE SPECIAL EXCEPTION SITE PLAN AMENDMENT APPLICATION
DURING THAT PART OF THE MEETING.
RIGHT NOW, MY GOAL IS JUST TO EXPLAIN WHY
WE NEED THIS TEMPORARY FIRE STATION AND HOW WE'LL BE OPERATING FROM IT.
THE ABACOA FIRE STATION,
ALSO KNOWN AS STATION 16,
IS LOCATED ON MILITARY TRAIL JUST NORTH OF FREDERICK SMALL ROAD.
PALMACH COUNTY FIRE RESCUE IS CURRENTLY USING THIS STATION TO PROVIDE SERVICE.
THE STATION WILL REVERT TO THE TOWN'S OWNERSHIP UNDER A REVERSIONARY DEED,
BUT THAT DEED PROVIDES FOR
THE REVERSION TO OCCUR AT THE TIME THAT THE COUNTY NO LONGER PROVIDES SERVICE.
WE'VE ATTEMPTED TO DEVELOP
A PHASE TRANSITION PLAN THAT WOULD INCLUDE THE TRANSITION OF THE ABACOA STATION.
THAT TRANSITION PLAN WAS DENIED.
AS IT STANDS NOW,
THE ABACOA FIRE STATION WILL REVERT TO THE TOWN'S OWNERSHIP ON OCTOBER 1ST OF 2026.
BUT JUPITER FIRE RESCUE MUST BE OPERATIONAL THAT VERY SAME DAY.
THIS FLIP OF A SWITCH APPROACH REQUIRES US
TO ESTABLISH A TEMPORARY FIRE STATION FOR THE ABACOA AREA.
OUR CURRENT PLAN IS TO PLACE A TEMPORARY FIRE STATION IN
THE NORTHWEST CORNER OF THE ABACOA COMMUNITY PARK.
AGAIN, WE'LL DISCUSS THIS FURTHER DURING
THE SPECIAL EXCEPTION AND SITE PLAN AMENDMENT SECTION OF YOUR AGENDA TONIGHT.
I'LL LEAVE YOU THIS AS ALWAYS,
IN JUST A LITTLE OVER SIX MONTHS FROM TONIGHT.
WE HAVE HIRED ALL OF OUR OPERATIONAL PERSONNEL,
COMPLETED OUR NEW FIRE STATIONS.
WE'LL HAVE ALL OF OUR APPARATUS AND EQUIPMENT IN PLACE,
AND WE'LL BE PREPARING FOR THE TRANSITION OF SERVICES TO JUPITER FIRE RESCUE.
IN A LITTLE OVER 10 MONTHS FROM TONIGHT,
THE JUPITER FIRE RESCUE DEPARTMENT WILL BEGIN PROVIDING
FULL FIRE AND EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY,
AND JUPITER FIRE RESCUE REMAINS ON SCHEDULE AND ON BUDGET.
